templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://safishing.com/apps/returns

templates.name: Do you ship to PO boxes?
templates.content: We don't currently ship to P.O. boxes.

templates.name: Store location
templates.content: You can visit our warehouse at 2045 High Ridge Road, Suite A, Boynton Beach, FL, 33426.

templates.name: Can you make a pack that's not on the site?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't have that option available. You can take a look at our pack deals here: https://safishing.com/collections/pack-deals-1

templates.name: What are the measurements for the arm shield?
templates.content: You can take a look at the measurements here: https://safishing.attn.tv/sl/gw472SAs

templates.name: Where are your straw hats made?
templates.content: Some of the raw materials are imported but the manufacturing and the final touch are made by us, in our facility in Boca Raton.

templates.name: Do you have a discount?
templates.content: Sure! You can use CS15 for a 15% off incentive!

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here - https://safishing.com/pages/warranty

templates.name: What are the measurements of your straw hats?
templates.content: You can take a look at the measurements of our straw hats here: https://prnt.sc/78LeoT9PrJ1z

templates.name: What kind of fur do your trapper hats use?
templates.content: The fur used in our trapper hats is faux fur.

templates.name: How do I send back a return?
templates.content: Please ship back the items you'd like to return to our facility at: 2045 High Ridge Rd, Suite A, Boynton Beach, FL 33426, with a note explaining what you would like (full refund or exchange).

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://safishing.com/pages/returns-and-exchanges

templates.name: Do you offer custom sizes for regular shirts & other apparel?
templates.content: Custom gear is only for custom designs. We work with the same sizes as for our normal apparel.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/sa_company/, FB: https://www.facebook.com/SAFISHINGCO, YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/SACompanyTVOfficial, and Twitter: https://twitter.com/OfficialSATeam

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to  help@sateam.company or feel free to call this number +1 (888) 704-0358, Monday-Friday 9:30am-5:30pm, and Saturday-Sunday 10am-6pm EST. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: Military discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! Please use MILITARY15 for 15% off!

templates.name: Where are the board shorts made?
templates.content: The board shorts are designed in the US and manufactured in China. They're made of feather-light performance 4-way stretch durable woven moisture-wicking material, built with a drawstring waistband and three pockets with zippers for all your needs.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest in us! Please fill out this form and our team will contact you as soon as possible: https://resellsa.com/pages/dealer-application

templates.name: Can you retroactively apply the code to my order?
templates.content: I'm afraid promo codes can only be placed during the checkout process, apologies for the inconvenience!

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship from our warehouse located in Boynton Beach, FL.

templates.name: Sponsorship inquiries
templates.content: Please fill out the form at the following link: https://safishing.com/pages/sponsorship Someone from the team will contact you as soon as possible.

templates.name: Size chart for swim trunks/board shorts
templates.content: Happy to help! Our clothes generally run true to size.  Would you mind sharing your usual size? If it helps, here's the size guide for our swim trunks/board shorts: https://prnt.sc/OLhwIkO66XnB and for our performance shirts: https://safishing.attn.tv/sl/r4IP-_Ud

templates.name: Brand ambassador
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and apply for our Ambassador Program here: https://safishing.com/pages/ambassador-program/

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at help@sateam.company or live chat with one of our representatives via the website: https://safishing.com/pages/customer-service Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What kind of lining is in the swim trunks?
templates.content: The swim trunks are made with a lightweight performance mesh inner short.

templates.name: What material are the arm shields made of?
templates.content: Arm ShieldsÂ® are made of breathable, UPF 30 Mmicrofiber, and are the ideal form of protection from sun, dust, and bugs.

templates.name: Restock button (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently.

templates.name: Ring size chart
templates.content: You can check out our ring size chart here - https://prnt.sc/XC2bUI7FhvYv

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (561) 210-5475, Monday-Friday 9:30am-5:30pm EST. Let me know if I can help via text as well, it may be faster.

templates.name: What does SA stand for?
templates.content: SA stands for Soul of Adventure.

templates.name: Post Purchase Inquiries
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to help@sateam.company, live chat with one of our representatives via the website: https://safishing.com/pages/customer-service or feel free to call this number (561) 210-5475, Monday-Friday 9:30am-5:30pm EST. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: Order Lookup/Tracking
templates.content:
For order tracking, please feel free to use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: 

https://safishing.com/pages/track-your-order

Let me know if you have any questions!

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://safishing.com/collections/daily-deals

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time is 2-3 business days and we usually ship via USPS or DHL. Once shipped it will take 10-14 business days domestically and 12-25 business days internationally.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $75. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
